entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
